thread.title: Jennifer Grey can't believe people still recreate the Dirty Dancing lift - Showbiz
thread.title_full: Jennifer Grey can't believe people still recreate the Dirty Dancing lift - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Tasha Hegarty
title: Jennifer Grey can't believe people still recreate the Dirty Dancing lift - Showbiz
text: If you haven't attempted that iconic Dirty Dancing lift yourself, you've at least watched countless celebrities re-enact it for your viewing pleasure.However, one who won't be attempting it again is the film's star Jennifer Grey.She told The Guardian: "God, no! I only did it on the day I shot it. Never rehearsed it, never done it since. "I don't know how all these people who re-enact it have the guts to throw themselves into the arms of anyone other than Patrick Swayze. It's insane!"She admitted she's asked all the time to perform the lift, but she won't give in. Â© AmazonRed Oaks "It's a non-starter. It happened, enjoy it, watch it over and over again but never ask me to do it again because I'm too f**king old... I have a family and I want to live longer."However, she said she is proud of the film and glad it still makes people happy."I'm so thrilled with any reference to anything I ever did that gave anyone an ounce of pleasure," she said. "We're so lucky to have worked on material with brilliant people and created characters with lasting value."The actress is currently starring in '80s drama Red Oaks on Amazon Prime.
